item.title: Hamas hands over another coffin containing remains to Israel
item.description: If the person's identity is confirmed as that of a dead hostage, it will mean six others are still in Gaza.

item.title: French police launch investigation into Al Fayed sex-trafficking allegations
item.description: The opulent Ritz Hotel, in the heart of Paris, is likely to be a prominent target of the investigation.

item.title: Inside Gaza, BBC sees total devastation after two years of war
item.description: With endless rubble and destroyed streets as far as the eye can see, any plans for Gaza's future are a far cry from where it is today, writes Lucy Wil...

item.title: At least nine people killed after UPS cargo plane crashes in Kentucky
item.description: Others were injured when the plane exploded during takeoff near Louisville Muhammad Ali International Airport.

item.title: Democrats hit back and a winning message - four election night takeaways
item.description: It was an encouraging night for the Democratic Party who scored some decisive wins. Here's what we learned.
